item.description:
Venez

... boire une verre et manger une tranche de pizza.
... faire la connaissance d'autres francophones.
... profiter d'une conversation amicale.
... et encore PLUS!

>> On Wednesday, Sept. 15, 2004, Brad and I held the first "réunion" of what is now the Seacoast NH French Language Meetup Group at La Festa. Don your chapeaux de fête(*) et venez nous rejoindre pour une Pizza Party chez La Festa -- où tout a commencé -- pour fêter les 3 ans de notre groupe ! <<

NB: Come hungry! Comme l'année dernière, I'll order some food for the group (early arrivals get to pick the pizzas); please purchase your own drinks at the counter. We'll have des gâteaux d'anniversaire, too.
=================
*Actually, you don't have to wear party hats, but you should join us anyway.

La Festa is located just south of Dover's downtown -- a few blocks south of Dover Soul and just north of the City Hall. Parking is on Central Avenue street in front of the restaurant or on the side street (St. Thomas, I think), and parking lots are located next to (between La Festa and Barley Pub) and behind the building.

http://www.lafestabri...

For more information, see http://www.lafestabri...

group.name: Seacoast NH French Language Meetup Group

item.name: Notre 3ème anniversaire!
